name: Professional Thief
description: Professional Thief - a first person stealth simulator where you play the role of a burglar and are supposed to rob a house.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 Storage: 200 MB available space
